Package com.example.lotteryapp

Class DBManagerEvent

java.lang.Object
com.example.lotteryapp.DBManagerEvent
public class DBManagerEvent extends Object
Manages database operations related to events using Firebase Firestore.

    • addEventToDatabase

      public Event addEventToDatabase(Event event)
      Adds an Event to the database and returns the Event.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event object to be added to the database.
      Returns:
      The added Event object if successful, null otherwise.

    • getEventsFromFirestore

      public void getEventsFromFirestore(GetEventsCallback callback)
      Retrieves all events from Firestore.
      Parameters:
      callback - The callback to handle the result.

    • getEventsByQRCodes

      public void getEventsByQRCodes(List<String> qrCodes, GetEventsCallback callback)
      Retrieves events by their QR codes.
      Parameters:
      qrCodes - The list of QR codes to fetch events for.
      callback - The callback to handle the result.

    • getEventByQRCode

      public void getEventByQRCode(String qrCode, DBManagerEvent.GetEventCallback callback)
      Retrieves an event by its QR code.
      Parameters:
      qrCode - The QR code of the event to retrieve.
      callback - The callback to handle the result.

    • removeEntrantsFromList

      public static void removeEntrantsFromList(List<Entrant> entrantList, String listName, DBManagerEvent.EntrantsUpdateCallback callback)
      Removes entrants from a specified list in the event document.
      Parameters:
      entrantList - The list of entrants to remove.
      listName - The name of the list to remove entrants from.
      callback - The callback to handle the result.

    • addEntrantsToList

      public static void addEntrantsToList(List<Entrant> entrantList, String listName, String eventId, DBManagerEvent.EntrantsUpdateCallback callback)
      Adds entrants to a specified list in the event document.
      Parameters:
      entrantList - The list of entrants to add.
      listName - The name of the list to add entrants to.
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      callback - The callback to handle the result.
